content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, I am glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a student, so I want to offer you a discount. How does 600 Euros sound?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not offering discounts based on the status of being a student. I am only interested in the highest possible rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
600 Euros is the best I can offer for this apartment. It's in the city center, close to all important facilities. I don't think I can go any lower.
[Question]
[YourResponse]
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
